short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dashboard for Wes-related news and resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A dashboard for Wesleyan University that aims to better inform students of campus life and provides easy access to commonly used resources.

0.0.4 Update:
- NEW app: WesMaps course randomizer
- Added link to Athletic Facility Hours
- Fixed film series 1-day lag bug
